body_html:
I hit this too.

For others waiting for a fix, monkey patch is a temporary workaround:

# Workaround for https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/7204
from tensorflow.python.ops import array_ops
from tensorflow.python.ops import math_ops
array_ops.reduce_prod = math_ops.reduce_prod

body:
I hit this too.

For others waiting for a fix, monkey patch is a temporary workaround:

```python
# Workaround for https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/7204
from tensorflow.python.ops import array_ops
from tensorflow.python.ops import math_ops
array_ops.reduce_prod = math_ops.reduce_prod
```
